name: _instance_hash
description: unique hash for a cocip regions output (flight-level and aircraft-class basis)

name: timestamp
description: predicted_at time for CoCip model run

name: aircraft_class
description: name for the aircraft_class used in running cocip

name: flight_level
description: flight level in hectofeet for the regions prediction

name: regions
description: arrival (landing) scheduled time for the flight instance
